mapper.sql: SELECT t1.`ATTENDANCEMREPORTMXID`, t61.`ATTENDANCEMREPORTMXNAME`, t1.`ATTENDANCERECORDID`, t1.`ATTENDANCERECORDNAME`, t1.`ATTENDDATE`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`DKFS`, t1.`DKSJQD`, t1.`DKSJQT`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`ISOUTLEAVE`, t1.`ISOUTOFFICE`, t11.`ORMORGID` AS `ORGID`, t11.`ORMORGSECTORID` AS `ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMBMKQDZID`, t41.`ORMBMKQDZNAME`, t11.`ORMORGID`, t51.`ZZDZS` AS `ORMORGNAME`, t11.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t21.`SHORTNAME` AS `ORMORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`TRMTRAINPLANTERMID`, t31.`TRMTRAINPLANTERMNAME`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t11.`YGBH`, t11.`ZJHM`, t51.`ZZDZS` FROM `T_ATTENDANCERECORD` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ORGSECTOR t21 ON t11.ORMORGSECTORID = t21.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_TRMTRAINPLANTERM t31 ON t1.TRMTRAINPLANTERMID = t31.TRMTRAINPLANTERMID LEFT JOIN T_ORMBMKQDZ t41 ON t1.ORMBMKQDZID = t41.ORMBMKQDZID LEFT JOIN T_ORG t51 ON t11.ORMORGID = t51.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_ATTENDANCEMREPORTMX t61 ON t1.ATTENDANCEMREPORTMXID = t61.ATTENDANCEMREPORTMXID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1

SELECT t1.ATTENDANCEMREPORTMXID, t61.ATTENDANCEMREPORTMXNAME, t1.ATTENDANCERECORDID, t1.ATTENDANCERECORDNAME, t1.ATTENDDATE, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.DKFS, t1.DKSJQD, t1.DKSJQT, t1.ENABLE, t1.ISOUTLEAVE, t1.ISOUTOFFICE, t11.ORMORGID AS ORGID, t11.ORMORGSECTORID AS ORGSECTORID, t1.ORMBMKQDZID, t41.ORMBMKQDZNAME, t11.ORMORGID, t51.ZZDZS AS ORMORGNAME, t11.ORMORGSECTORID, t21.SHORTNAME AS ORMORGSECTORNAME, t1.PIMPERSONID, t11.PIMPERSONNAME, t1.TRMTRAINPLANTERMID, t31.TRMTRAINPLANTERMNAME, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t11.YGBH, t11.ZJHM, t51.ZZDZS FROM T_ATTENDANCERECORD t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t21 ON t11.ORMORGSECTORID = t21.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_TRMTRAINPLANTERM t31 ON t1.TRMTRAINPLANTERMID = t31.TRMTRAINPLANTERMID LEFT JOIN T_ORMBMKQDZ t41 ON t1.ORMBMKQDZID = t41.ORMBMKQDZID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t51 ON t11.ORMORGID = t51.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_ATTENDANCEMREPORTMX t61 ON t1.ATTENDANCEMREPORTMXID = t61.ATTENDANCEMREPORTMXID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1
